text:
I do not know exactly what is going on, but the "Manager"
Servlet should behave different when being told to reload
itself. It should at least give an error-msg in an appropriate
time. The request hangs and the manager does not answer further
requests.

text: This has been fixed a while ago (and was probably a duplicate bug).
